column2: it was just as amazing! We ordered the shrimp cocktail for an app (HUGE-like 10 pieces of delicious shrimp)
column3: the 10 oz. filet with buttery mash and elote style corn for sides. We STILL had leftovers at the end
column4: very nice portion sizes for shareable sides. And the service was on point! Refilling water glasses
column7: good timing between drinks/apps/main course. And our server Eric was amazing! Overall an amazing experience!
